column1: Selina Kyle (Catwoman): On a more positive note, I like the Catwoman figure quite a bit. As is usual for the character, she sports a catsuit, the print for the torso is very intricate and I love the silver shine on the belt buckle and zipper. Admittedly though, the lack of leg print is disappointing but not too big of a deal. The 2 excellent face prints feature a cunning smirk and a smile with a raised eyebrow and they perfectly capture the character. The hair choice was fitting and I&rsquo
column2: m pleased with the inclusion of her bike helmet, giving an option to swap out the hair with. Lastly, her accessory is a chain. Overall, some leg print would&rsquo

column2: the best aspect of this set is the price. R250 for this feels reasonable and fair. For that price you get 2 figures, 2 bikes and a bat signal, pretty substantial if you ask me, especially when compared to minifigure packs.
